doc:
Bud Duncan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bud_Duncan 0 Bud Duncan (October 31, 1883 – November 25, 1960) was an American actor of the silent era, most known for his early work with silent film comedian Lloyd Hamilton. He appeared in 167 films between 1912 and 1942. Bud_Duncan ( October_31_,_1883 – November_25_,_1960 ) was an_American_actor of the_silent_era , most_known for his_early_work with silent_film_comedian_Lloyd_Hamilton . He appeared in 167_films between 1912_and_1942 .
